title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 124.3 - Subject matter list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 124.3 - Subject matter list

State Regulations
A reasonably detailed list, by subject
matter, of all records in the possession of the Office of Court Administration, whether or not the records are subject to public inspection and copying
pursuant to the Freedom of Information Law, shall be available for public
inspection and copying at the business office of the records access officer. The subject matter list shall be updated annually, and the date of the most
recent revision shall be indicated on the first page of the
list. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
124.3

Sec. filed July 12, 1985 eff. 7/1/1985; amended
on
12/7/2021. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
